name: Fixing Your Teeth
description: Over time, your teeth become dull, yellow, and stained, making you look unhealthy, aged, and less attractive.

name: Teeth Whitening
description: Combine 2 teaspoons of hydrogen peroxide with 1 teaspoon of baking soda and gently brush your teeth with the mixture.

name: Tooth Protection
description: Brush several times a day. First and foremost, good oral hygiene starts with brushing several times each day.

name: Fixing Your Teeth
description: Implants are the gold standard for permanently replacing missing teeth or teeth that are too decayed or damaged to be repaired.
